title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 381.3 - Registration fees for life settlement intermediaries
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 381.3 - Registration fees for life settlement intermediaries

State Regulations
(a) The application for registration as a life settlement intermediary shall be made on such forms and supplements as prescribed by the superintendent and shall be accompanied by a non-refundable fee of $7,500. (b) The application for the biennial renewal of a life settlement intermediary registration shall be made on such forms and supplements as prescribed by the superintendent and shall be accompanied by a non-refundable fee of $2,500. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
